SELECT a.id,a.product_id as productId,b.product_name as productName,b.brand_id as brandId,b.category_id as categoryId, b.type_id as typeId,a.product_price as productPrice,a.product_market_price as productMarketPrice,a.product_cost_price as productCostPrice, h.spec_id as specId, i.spec_values_id as specValuesId,a.spec_value as specValue, a.product_status as productStatus, a.product_stock as productStock, c.brand_name as brandName, d.category_name as categoryName, e.type_name as typeName, a.spec_name as specName, a.last_update_time as lastUpdateTime,a.create_time as createTime,a.stat FROM sport_m_product_sku a LEFT JOIN sport_m_product_spu b on a.product_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_product_spec h on a.id = h.product_sku_id LEFT JOIN sport_m_product_spec_values i on a.id = i.product_sku_id LEFT JOIN sport_m_brand c on b.brand_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_category d on b.category_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_type e on b.type_id = e.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_spec f on h.spec_id = f.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_spec_values g on i.spec_values_id = g.id WHERE a.stat =1 and b.stat = 1 and c.stat=1 and d.stat=1 and e.stat=1 and f.stat=1 and g.stat=1 and h.stat=1 and i.stat=1
GROUP BY h.product_sku_id ORDER BY a.create_time desc limit #{page.startNum}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sport_m_product_sku a LEFT JOIN sport_m_product_spu e on a.product_id = e.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_order_info b on a.id = b.product_sku_id LEFT JOIN sport_m_order c on b.order_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sport_user d on c.user_id = d.id WHERE a.stat =1 and b.stat = 1 and c.stat = 1 and e.stat = 1
and a.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT a.id as productSkuId,b.spec_id as specId,c.spec_name as specName,d.spec_values_id as specValuesId,e.spec_value as specValue FROM sport_m_product_sku a LEFt JOIN sport_m_product_spec b on a.id = b.product_sku_id LEFT JOIN sport_m_spec c on b.spec_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sport_m_product_spec_values d on a.id = d.product_sku_id LEFT JOIN sport_m_spec_values e on d.spec_values_id = e.id WHERE a.stat =1 and b.stat = 1 and c.stat=1 and d.stat=1 and e.stat=1 and a.id = #{productSkuId}
